abstract: Bank of America, the country’s largest bank, is halting all foreclosure proceedings and sales of foreclosed homes indefinitely.
snippet: Bank of America, the country’s largest bank, is halting all foreclosure proceedings and sales of foreclosed homes indefinitely.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America, the country’s largest bank, said Friday that it was halting all foreclosure proceedings and sales of foreclosed homes indefinitely, David Streitfeld of The New York Times reports.

headline.main: Bank of America Halts Foreclosure Sales
